channel.title: Objects on Aetherway
channel.description: Recent content in Objects on Aetherway

item.title: The Energy Conversion Card
item.description:
An ancient artifact considered sacred by many religions. The card reads:

“Convert 2 negative vibes into 2 positive ones. Then shuffle your deck.”

item.title: The Passion Amplifier Machine
item.description: An ancient artifact, designed with the sole purpose of amplifying people’s passions. It is believed to create a chain reaction capable of transforming the fabric of reality.

item.title: The Traveler's Codex
item.description: An ancient text, attributed to an unknown and alleged interdimensional traveler. Revered as sacred by many religions, its oldest surviving copy was mysteriously discovered inside a bag of toilet paper.
